name: Church Defender
description:
Church Defenders! Endless spawning of demons come to destroy your church, place turrets shoot bullets and repel the demons back below!

Use W to move towards your mouse cursor and LMB to shoot

Q to go into turret mode and press Space to place down on player location

(Only before the slaughter) Max 3

the less turrets the harder!

RMB Special Ability

Made with Playmaker for Jam 2020

Thanks for playing and please VOTE!

Assets Used 

Free Pixel Camera Shader

Everything else was made by me!

Song is an old song i made, but found it relevant to use it link below:
